author: ttrk
body:
**Description**

This is a backport of PR [37262](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37262) where description can be found. This backport is to address the issue [37841](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37841).

**Validation**
Tests pass wf 140.5611 and give correct output.

@mandrenguyen
title: [11_2_X] Associated PF for Egamma in 2018 PbPb miniAOD
